document.text:
Steptoe 
STEPTOE 1 JOHNSON OAP 
Michael C. Miller 
direct 
fax 
1114 Avenue of the Americas 
New York, NY 10036 
212 506 3900 main 
wmv.steptoe.com 
August 23, 2019 
Via Electronic Mail 
Legal Department 
Metropolitan Correctional Center 
Re: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, 19-CRIM-00490 (S.D.N.Y.) 
Dear 
This letter is respectfully submitted pursuant to United States ex rel. Touhy 
v. 
Regan, 
340 
U.S. 462 
(1951), 
and the associated regulations, 28 
C.F.R. §§ 16.21-16.26. 
We are defense counsel of record for Jeffrey Epstein, Reg No. 76318-054, who 
was previously incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correction Center in New York, New 
York (the "MCC") while awaiting trial on federal charges in the above-captioned case. 
Attached hereto is a subpoena, issued under Rule 17(c) of the Federal Rules of 
Criminal Procedure, seeking any and all medical or mental health records relating to 
Mr. Epstein. The requested records are necessary to counsel's investigation of the 
circumstances of Mr. Epstein's death. 
Please provide the requested records by 5:3o p.m., August 26, 2019. 
Thank you in advance for your assistance in this matter. 
EFTA00022167

August 23, 2019 
Page 2 
Sincerely,
Michael C. Miller 
Steptoe 
& Johnson LLP 
1114 Avenue of the Americas 
New York, NY 
10036 
Martin G. Weinberg 
Martin G. Weinberg, P.C. 
20 Park Plaza, Suite 
1000 
Boston, MA 02116 
EFTA00022168
